audit_logs_by_creation.map: function(doc) { if ( doc.pvt_deleted || doc.pvt_type != 'audit_log') return; emit(doc.pvt_created, null); }

audit_logs_by_account.map: function(doc) { if ( doc.pvt_deleted || doc.pvt_type != 'audit_log') return; var account = doc.tree[doc.tree.length-1]; emit([account, doc.pvt_created], null); }
